text:
Cholesky
factorization
eration on symmetric, positive deﬁnite matrices that is useful in practice.
Theorem 4.18 (Cholesky Decomposition). A symmetric, positive deﬁnite
matrix Acan be factorized into a product A= LL⊤, where Lis a lower-
triangular matrix with positive diagonal elements:


a11 ··· a1n
... ... ...
an1 ··· ann

=


l11 ··· 0
... ... ...
ln1 ··· lnn




l11 ··· ln1
... ... ...
0 ··· lnn

. (4.44)
Lis called the Cholesky factor of A, and Lis unique.Cholesky factor
